title: WTB: Lionel Carter Collection HOF, O'Hara/Demmitt St. Louis
author: txaggie00

posts.post_title: WTB: Lionel Carter Collection HOF, O'Hara/Demmitt St. Louis
posts.post_content:
With a representation of Lionel Carter Collection cards currently residing in my SGC set, I'm looking to round it out with some Hall of Famers and variations if available.

In addition to hall of famers, O'Hara/Demmitt St. Louis I'd be interested in Dahlen Brooklyn and Elberfeld Washington Portrait.

Please PM or e-mail [url]alstonjb@aol.com[/url] if you you have any available.

Thanks!
